SEARCH

Package com.example.cmput301f24mikasa

package com.example.cmput301f24mikasa
  • Class
    Description
    AdminActivity
    AdminActivity provides the main dashboard for administrators to manage various application aspects such as facilities, user profiles, images, and events.
    CreateEventActivity
    The CreateEventActivity class is responsible for creating an event, uploading a poster, generating a QR Code that links to the unique eventID, then uploading the information to Firebase Firestore and Storage.
    Event
    Represents an event in the application.
    EventArrayAdapter
    EventArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a ListView, with buttons for viewing, editing, and deleting each event.
    EventArrayAdapter.OnEventClickListener
    Interface to define the actions for each button in the event item layout.
    EventFinalListActivity
    EventFinalListActivity displays the final list of entrants for a specific event.
    EventPosterActivity
    EventPosterActivity is responsible for generating an event poster based on the details provided by CreateEventActivity through the intent.
    EventResultList
    EventResultList is an Activity that displays the selected and canceled entrants for a specific event.
    EventsActivity
    This activity serves as the main interface for managing and navigating event-related features in the application.
    EventsJoinedActivity
    Activity that displays a list of events the current device has signed up for.
    EventsJoinedAdapter
    Custom ArrayAdapter to display a list of events the user has signed up for.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FacilityAdapter
    Custom ArrayAdapter to display a list of facility names, with options to view or delete each facility.
    FacilityProfileActivity
    The FacilityProfileActivity class provides the UI and functionality for managing a facility profile.
    ListSamplingActivity
    Activity for managing the random selection of participants from the event's waiting list.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity serves as the entry point of the app.
    ManageEventsActivity
    ManageEventsActivity is responsible for managing and displaying events created by the current device.
    ManageFacilitiesActivity
    ManageFacilitiesActivity is responsible for displaying and managing the list of facilities in the admin interface.
    ManageNotificationsActivity
    ManageNotificationsActivity is responsible for displaying and managing the list of notifications for the user.
    ManageProfileActivity
    Activity to manage and view user profiles.
    ManagingWaitListActivity
    Activity to manage the waiting list of an event.
    NotificationArrayAdapter
    ArrayAdapter to display notifications in a ListView.
    Notifications
    Represents a notification sent to a user related to an event.
    NotificationSettingsActivity
    Activity that handles the settings for notifications, allowing the user to enable or disable notifications.
    OrganizerSendsNotification
    Activity that handles sending notifications to selected and non-selected entrants for a specific event.
    ProfileDetailActivity
    ProfileDetailActivity displays detailed information about the user profile, including the user's name, email, phone number, and profile image.
    ProfilesActivity
    ProfilesActivity is responsible for displaying the profile options to the user.
    QRDisplayActivity
    QRDisplayActivity is responsible for displaying the QR code text that was scanned by the user.
    QRScannerActivity
    QRScannerActivity is responsible for scanning QR codes using the device's camera.
    UnjoinEventActivity
    Activity that allows users to unjoin an event they have previously signed up for.
    UserProfile
    Represents a user's profile containing their personal details and the events they have joined.
    UserProfileActivity
    Activity for managing the user's profile, including updating personal details (name, email, phone number), uploading/removing profile images, and saving the profile to Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage.
    UserProfileArrayAdapter
    Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of UserProfile objects in a ListView.
    UserProfileManager
    Singleton class for managing the UserProfile throughout the application.
    ViewEventActivity
    Activity to view event details and sign up for an event by adding the device to the waiting list.
    ViewEventsJoined
    Activity that displays the details of an event the user has joined.
    ViewFacilityActivity
    Activity that displays details of a specific facility.
    WaitingListActivity
    Activity that displays the waiting list for a specific event.
